name: I'm outta here!
description:
A game made for the Bored Pixels Jam 8.

Take upon a selfish quest for self-preservation in the aftermath of an unexplained disaster. Manage your oxygen level and navigate through the danger zone in order to escape (and leave your former colleagues behind) ! Check out our protoype of a maybe-someday-semi-procedural platformer, all that in green tint.

Code: xh32

Art & Design: dbsway
